<div style="text-align: justify; font-size: 1em;">
  <p><strong>Wenlan Zhang</strong> is a second-year PhD student at the <a href="https://www.ucl.ac.uk/bartlett/casa/bartlett-centre-advanced-spatial-analysis" target="_blank">The Bartlett Centre for Advanced Spatial Analysis (CASA)</a>, University College London.</p>

  <p>She is currently working on her research project titled <em>"Quantifying Digital Injustice: The Utility of Digital Footprint Data in the Global South"</em>, under the supervision of <a href="https://smartcityanalysis.com/team.html" target="_blank">Dr. Chen Zhong</a>, <a href="https://profiles.ucl.ac.uk/90166-mark-pelling" target="_blank">Prof. Mark Pelling</a>, and <a href="https://www.kcl.ac.uk/people/faith-taylor" target="_blank">Dr. Faith Taylor</a>.</p>

  <p>Wenlan's research interests lie in sustainable smart cities, particularly in Global South countries, and she aims to pursue a career in this sector in the future. Feel free to <a href="mailto:wenlan.zhang.21@ucl.ac.uk">contact her</a> to discuss potential projects.</p>
</div>

<div style="text-align: justify; font-size: 1em;">
  <p><strong>张文澜</strong>是伦敦大学学院巴特莱特建筑学院下属高级空间分析系的一名博士二年级学生，博士导师为<a href="https://smartcityanalysis.com/team.html" target="_blank">钟晨</a>、<a href="https://profiles.ucl.ac.uk/90166-mark-pelling" target="_blank">Mark Pelling</a>和<a href="https://www.kcl.ac.uk/people/faith-taylor" target="_blank">Faith Taylor</a>。</p>

  <p>她的研究方向主要集中在数据收集和算法层面解决全球南方的数据收集不平等问题，研究案例为肯尼亚首都内罗毕市。</p>

  <p>张文澜对可持续智慧城市在全球南方的发展十分感兴趣，并希望未来在此领域就业。</p>
</div>
